lines.text: Final image inverted, at infinity, virtual

secText:
Lesson:
1. Apply the concepts of lenses to the [OBJ:expsec_u276:human eye].
2. Define [OBJ:expsec_u277:near and far points].
3. Apply the concept of diverging lenses to [OBJ:pwsec_u279:glasses].
4. Apply the concept of angle of refraction to [OBJ:expsec_u280:laser eye surgery].
5. Apply the concept of converging lenses to [OBJ:expsec_u281:refracting telescopes].
